name: sewing : address label
description:
Use this address stamp to add a personal touch to your letters and packages. You stamp directly onto envelopes or stamp onto self adhesive stickers.

[ details ]
:: unmounted
:: 2" x 4"
:: each stamp has been hand carved.
:: made using firm, non-crumbling rubber.
:: rubber is white and 1/4" thick.
:: stamp [may] have a light tint of ink as a result from testing it. 

This stamp has already been made and is ready to ship.
Because each one is hand carved, the one you receive may be slightly different than the one pictured. I try very hard to make them almost identical.

--- please contact me for info on using my stamps for commercial purposes. ---

[ shipping ]
Domestic orders are shipped first class with delivery confirmation through the USPS.
Orders are shipped on Tuesday and Friday.

International orders are marked “other” and the customer is responsible for any additional customs fees/taxes. Narchi is not responsible for items that are lost or destroyed by customs. International orders are only shipped on Friday.

name: sewing kit : set of 4
description:
An essential kit for anyone who loves rubber stamps and sewing. Included in the kit : sewing machine, spool of thread, pair of scissors, pin cushion.

[ details ]
:: wooden spool acts as a handle.
:: diameter of wooden spool 7/8 in. : 2.2 cm.
:: set of 4.
:: each stamp has been hand carved.
:: made using firm, non-crumbling rubber.
:: rubber is white and 1/4" thick.
